subject: Re: Regarding Certification/Training details on JUnit
msgSnippet: Purvi, There is no official certification offered by the developers.  There certainly are training classes offered in unit testing and test-driven development,
messageBody:
Purvi,

There is no official certification offered by the developers. There
certainly are training classes offered in unit testing and test-driven
development, but I wouldn't know more than you could learn from your
favorite search engine. Thanks,

David

On Thu, Aug 13, 2009 at 6:57 AM, Purvi Verma<Purvi.Verma@...> wrote:
>
>
> Hi,
>
> I am Purvi Verma working on JUnit. Just wanted to know if there are any
> certifications/training available for JUnit - Open Source unit testing tool
> . These certifications/training details are required as per business
> requirements. We would like to get few of our associated certified. Please
> let us know if you have any learning partner or JUnit itself could provide
> us the training/certifications.
>
> Request you provide the appropriate contact list if I have posted the query
> on the wrong mailing list.
>
> Thanks and Regards,
> Purvi Verma
>
